name: cubes on the floor
description:
cubes on the floor

a tiny game where you can throw cubes around

controls:

click and drag on the cubes to move them

use the mouse wheel or arrow/AD/QE keys to rotate the cubes

press R to shuffle the cubes in case you lose them

press M or click the bottom-right button to mute the music

Art and music originally produced by Bruce & Katharine Cornwell: http://www.afana.org/cornwell.htm

see the included 'hello.txt' for more credits and such
